game.name: FENDERSHOT
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Street racing meets car combat. Inspired by Blur, NFS:U, Midnight Club and other 2000s arcade racers. Take on fierce rivals in an intense street racing league, either solo or in local multiplayer (splitscreen). Bolts, shockwaves, mines and other race tech at your disposal. Trust me, you'll need it.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Street racing meets car combat. Inspired by Blur, NFS:U, Midnight Club and other 2000s arcade racers. Take on fierce rivals in an intense street racing league, either solo or in local multiplayer (splitscreen). Bolts, shockwaves, mines and other race tech at your disposal. Trust me, you'll need it.
